name: Linear
description: Linear issue tracking integration. Create issues, manage projects, update statuses, search across workspaces, and streamline your software development workflow with Linear's modern issue tracker.
longDescription: Connects to Linear's hosted MCP endpoint via HTTP at `mcp.linear.app`. Create and update issues, manage projects and cycles, search across teams, and update statuses from Claude Code. No local server to install -- authenticates through Linear's OAuth flow.
